meanings.definition: The branch of medicine dealing with children and their diseases.
meanings.sent1: Paediatrics focuses on treating young patients.
meanings.sent2: She decided to specialize in paediatrics to help sick children.
meanings.sent3: The clown in the paediatrics ward made the kids laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her love for paediatrics bloomed after volunteering at a children's hospital.
meanings.sent5: The colourful walls in the paediatrics unit brightened the atmosphere for the little patients.

meanings.definition: The medical care of infants, children, and adolescents.
meanings.sent1: Doctors in paediatrics provide healthcare for kids.
meanings.sent2: The paediatrics department is always busy with young patients.
meanings.sent3: The teddy bear in the paediatrics waiting room brought comfort to the children.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for paediatrics grew stronger with each successful treatment.
meanings.sent5: The dedicated nurses in paediatrics ensure every child receives proper care and attention.
